content: Starred topics akin to Starred messages for Topics that a user wants to keep a track of. Thoughts?
Where would the ui to access these started topics be?
Top left with starred messages I assume. Or if the Pinned Topics thing pans out that'd be even better.
What do you think of "Topics I follow", as a thing on which you can set notification preferences?

That would be slightly different, no? This is a great idea, but having starred topics could be used for topics that I meant to save for future reference but don't necessarily won't to follow/get notified about.
Right now I usually have to star a message or two if I want to save the topic as a whole so that I can get back to it at a later date. It's still not ideal though.
Would "Topics I follow" include access to the set of followed topics? In which case I think these ideas would be more similar.

cool. I agree the feature you're suggesting would be very useful, though not totally sure yet how we would implement it.
(I think likely the UI for this will be easier to figure out once we figure out the UI for "topics I follow")
Wyatt Hoodes I think yes, so one could use "Topics I follow" for this purpose.
If you consider expanding starred messages to have a topic list, would that be equivalent? We've discussed a little of how this might look like in #zulip-terminal .
Yeah, possibly making a version of the prototype "unread messages" view that shows starred messages rather than unread messages would basically do this.
Probably not worth working on until we've merged "unread messages".
(Which I'll probably want to get someone involved in helping with, once I do an initial review of that branch)

@Tim Abbott I would love to help with unread messages branch, this will help me to implement "topics I follow" too. According to one of our past discussion, this was one of the issue that was blocking the work on "my topics" or "topics I follow" right?
Please tag me on GitHub during the review of the branch if you think I can help with that :sweat_smile:
Topics I follow feature is one of those feature I think fromwhich Zulip will benefit alot and I want to be a part of developing it :big_smile:
Add a way that topics I post something to are automatically starred so I can see them quickly and check if something new was posted even when I'm not directly mentioned.
Otherwise I have to remember what topics I posted something to.

Add a way that topics I post something to are automatically starred so I can see them quickly and check if something new was posted even when I'm not directly mentioned.

This would be the "Topics I follow" notification that Rishi Gupta mentioned. This would, ideally, "subscribe" you to every topic you create or respond to.
It would bombard the user with notifications, though, if that is what we choose to do. Not sure what the best way forward is here
(fwiw, Rishi Gupta did mention something about notification preferences)

yeah, I think the long-term solution here is to have a setting that allows you to pick between
- Never follow topics automatically
- Automatically follow any topic I start
- Automatically follow any topic I react to (star, send a message, emoji react)

And then each notification for a topic allows you to unfollow that topic (at least the email notifications, not sure if you can embed sufficiently granular actions in mobile notifications).
Autofollow makes a lot of sense and then a single click-action to unsubscribe. Straight and simple.
